channel.title: What makes a npc attack a player?
channel.description:
what makes a npc attack a player?
im trying to get a npc to follow the player and then attack but it doesnt attack and its not like mage where you mage the npc it waits and then it follows and attacks

thats hits -.- no one understands my question
what makes a NPC ATTACK A PLAYER
